mapper.select: SELECT c.image, c.size, c.color, c.users_user_number AS userNumber, c.products_custom_number AS customNumber, p.product, c.indate AS inDate, c.regdate AS regDate FROM products_custom c INNER JOIN products p ON c.products_productnumber = p.product_number
mapper.update: UPDATE products_custom SET image = #{image}, size = #{size}, color = #{color}, regdate = #{regDate} WHERE products_custom_number = #{customNumber}
